content.name: com.microchip.mcc.boardsupportlibrary.BoardSuppportLibrary
content.summary:
MCC Board Support Library

Microchip produces development boards which are used by customers to jump start their designs. MCC Board Support Library allows the users to easily configure and generate the code for the selected board of their choice without going through lot of documentation. Board Support Library helps in auto configuration of the Pins and Peripheral modules present in the development board.

More Information

Refer to the release notes above for the list of supported devices and a more in-depth description. Future releases will add features, and support for additional boards.
